website_summaries.verdict: The LG BD590 deftly handles Blu-ray playback, CD ripping, and streaming media services like Netflix from a single box, but you'll have to pay for that simplicity.
pros: rips CDs directly to built-in 250GB hard drive
Netflix, Vudu, YouTube, Pandora, and CinemaNow streaming
plays music, videos, and pictures off a connected USB drive or via network
cons: no quick-start mode, which makes it feel slower compared with some other players
must change the output mode to 1080p

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with a remote!
customer_reviews.text: How in the heck do you expect to control this without a remote? Maybe the seller should note that it does not come with one! Also no CD, no manual, no Cords except power cord. Bummer... Now I have to try and find all this after the purchase & delivery.....
customer_reviews.author: Dreger Family

customer_reviews.title: Excellence in Operation Programming
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised when I installed this into an existing system, with a high end LG 60" plasma. Simply turning on the BluRay unit caused the plasma to turn on and select the proper input. Though I still included the discreet IR commands in the main system program, just to be sure, it seems that for most, they will find this the easiest setup ever. WiFi integration, for downloading to HD, or streaming, was quick and the user interface is excellent. It delivers on image quality too, worth the setup to enable THX color calibration on the plasma, as well as a modified version also, for those who have the skills to tweak the factory settings.
customer_reviews.author: Consumate Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic Support
customer_reviews.text: Initially I really liked this device, has issues with thumbnails of .jpg s. But then it went blank screen after start up. Three support calls later we knew we had to ship it back for repairs. Thank god it was within 90 days of purchasing it (otherwise way too much to pay for repairs). Now 14 days after receiving it and three more phone calls to the factory in Huntsville, AL I'm told it will be another 30 days for the part to arrive. So I have been without it for 1/3 of the time I've owned it. (Now that is saying they will actually fulfill their statement ....I'm not holding my breath.)
customer_reviews.author: Paul S

customer_reviews.title: just awesome!
customer_reviews.text: this thing is great. it does everything...can store all my mp3s, even extra downloaded movies (avi, mpeg, various encoding types). can watch netflix. pandora. for someone who wants a good multimedia center without much setup, its great. obviously if you want a lot more advanced options, like various types of recording, this isnt gonna do it. but its perfect for me. my only gripe is that netflix looks a bit granulated or pixelated sometimes...that could be because of the network though. after all, i have it connected over wifi. even then its really quite good most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Really good all around
customer_reviews.text: I dont have much negative to say. This does exactly what it says it does. I have only had it for a few weeks so I haven't even gotten to try out the internal HD or attaching an external HD. But I can wirelessly stream Netflix. I do wish there was more applications that I could download like Hulu or Crackle things of that nature. But great picture quality and easy to use. My only complaint is that the remote is not all that user friendly the buttons you use the most often are to close to each other and I press the wrong thing moderately often...especially in the dark. Besides that I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Landon

customer_reviews.title: Great player and much more
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for the past several years and it works great. It is perfect as a Blu-ray player, but it is much more then that. You can easily hook it to internet via its wireless capability, and then enjoy Netflix, Youtube, and others at your TV. On top of that it can play music or display pictures stored on your PC with only a little bit more setup. The only problem - so far I could not get it to display pictures bigger than 3MB, but it does not have this limit when playing music. Tom
customer_reviews.author: T. Jasiak

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to update software
customer_reviews.text: Nice, feature rich BD player. I popped in an Avatar BD & it wouldn't play, with a screen talking about updating player software. Restarted the player, without the disc, and since the unit was connected to my home internet connection, a screen popped up saying an update was available for the player. This is a lengthy process (about 25 minutes depending on your internet speed) which must not be interrupted once started. Once that was complete and the unit restarted, Avatar played perfectly. Overall, I'm very pleased with the unit and it's connectivity to Netflix, etc.
customer_reviews.author: TCB47

customer_reviews.title: a great buy - consumer reports likes it too
customer_reviews.text: I read the mostly positive reviews about this DVD player on Amazon as well as the good rating from CR. I was not disappointed when I received the player from Amazon. It was super easy to get my wireless access point in communication with the DVD player. It also very easy to make a connection to my PC so I can view pix/video and listen to music that sits on the PC. I am a Netflix customer so with the wireless connection, I'm able to view my "Instant View" queue on Netflix. It is nothing short of fantastic. The picture quality is great. At this price point, you cannot go wrong with this LG DVD player. I love mine!
customer_reviews.author: Marietta Maven

customer_reviews.title: LG BD 890 Bluray Player
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bluray purchase. I did a fair share of looking around, mostly on-line. I bought the BD 590 mainly because the Amazon price was really good for all the features included, especially the 250G hard drive. Hook up was simple because I have WiFi. My WiFi is not real fast so the hard drive came in handy when I downloaded some added features from an Avatar bluray dvd vs streaming which probably would have been choppy. It took quite a while to download to the dvd hard drive but playback is fine. It was also easy to check for firmware updates since there is a icon for that and I downloaded an update thru the WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Szymonik

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I can't beleive the price. Now that 3d newer models came out the price was reduced for these players. I beleive earlier issues that some purchasers had got resolved. My player is flawless. I did not have any issues so far. It's been a month since I connected it. The Internet connection was instant. It worked from the first attempt. Netflix took longer because I couldn't find the right code. The picture quality and Instant view are wonderful. I highly recommend this model to anyone. A child could hook it up!
customer_reviews.author: IloveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Best darn DVD player I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Great BluRay DVD player. Beyond doing a great job playing SD and BR Disk, the Internal hard drive allows all sorts of files to be copied via the USB port. Copy an AVI, MKV, or many other format movies onto the internal 250gig drive and plays great. Also supports audio photo and photo display. Many i-net features YouTube, Hulu, etc. Best darn DVD player I have EVERY owned.
customer_reviews.author: FranticInFresno

customer_reviews.title: LG BD590 all that and more..
customer_reviews.text: Have had the LG 590 a couple of days and it is a great piece of technology. It does everything well. I love being able to stream my music collection from my computers through it to my stereo receiver...no Ethernet wires to mess with...wireless music with no buffering. The Netflix hookup is flawless. I have a Linksys 802.11b wireless router, even though it is about 4 or 5 generations old, it streams video without a hiccup. I haven't messed with the 250 gig hard drive built in, but I'm sure I will find a use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ray and Renate

customer_reviews.title: Great idea that could be better executed
customer_reviews.text: In theory, a great idea and for the most part I was very happy. It would have been nice to be able to plug in a keyboard to make changes to song and album titles. Really liked having one place to keep all my music and if needed purchased movies. I would however purchase again. The remote sucked and is a big problem on this device and my LG TV which was horrible (remote only, TV was great). I have enjoyed all my LG products just not the remotes.
customer_reviews.author: “You Are Here”

customer_reviews.title: Great Blu-Ray player at a great price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this about a month ago. Since then, we've used it for watching DVDs, Blu-rays, Netflix, and Youtube. It's been great in all cases. I really love all the functionality you get with this player. The only thing I wish it had was 5 gigahertz wireless N. But even the standard N works out well enough in my case. We've been streaming Netflix and Youtube across it with no problems. The upscanning for DVDs has been nice, and of course blu-rays look fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: J. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: I love this player
customer_reviews.text: I'm not much for reviews but I am very happy with this purchase. Set-up was a breeze and Pandora, Netflix and Vudu all work amazingly well. I find myself using those services much more than I used to. I like the fact that I can burn my CD's onto the hard-drive however it seems to take a while and there aren't any editing options once burned. For instance I have a few EPs that were not recognized by the software and I do not seem to have the ability to enter the information myself. The picture quality seems great but I am no expert. Still I recomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rob C

customer_reviews.title: O.k but the BD 570 is cheeper and faster
customer_reviews.text: I own this model and the step down LG BD 570. They are suppose to run the same but the BD 570 loads faster and is runs much cooler. The BD 590 seams to be more disc sensitive with being glitchy. I made sure both had the latest and identical firmware updates. Both work great with Netflix and streaming videos from my home network. I just don't find the 250gb hard drive in the LG 590 that useful if you are streaming any way. Save some coin and buy the LG 570.
customer_reviews.author: PSUMountains

customer_reviews.title: Great Blue Ray!
customer_reviews.text: Hooked this blue ray up as soon as it came and after 15 min we were watching movies in surround in and had a great picture- we have a 58" 1080P HD TV. For the money this unit is great! We have our wireless router upstairs at the other end of the house and had no problem connecting to it or streaming movies or Pandora - Have been using Net Flix on the Wii and the Blue ray is noticeably faster in downloading and streaming. Love having Pandora all the time in great sound! Would recommend this for the a little more then basic Blue Ray desire.
customer_reviews.author: T. Forsman

customer_reviews.title: LG BD590 Blue Ray Player
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price thru Amazon, which was as much as $100 less than some other retailers. Product is fairly easy to connect & setup, as the owners manual is pretty well written. Did contact manufacturer, as unit was taking extremely long to download an update, and their support was highly satisfactory, providing me with alternate means for update download. Been utilizing unit for over 2 weeks and am high satisfied and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dirty Davey

customer_reviews.title: LG Blu-Ray - better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This player works very well, but the owner's manual needs a major correction. I had to call LG's customer service to find out why the player wouldn't recognize my wireless LAN. The problem was solved quickly and courteously by a rep who knew exactly what was wrong, because an instruction had been omitted from the manual. (Network Passwords are case-sensitive, but there was no upper-case visible on the menu.) Otherwise, this player performs well within expectations.
customer_reviews.author: R. Berryman

customer_reviews.title: Firmware support lacking
customer_reviews.text: This player required frequent firmware support downloads and lacks the ability to add additional apps so the user can only connect online to the online services that come preloaded from LG. The firmware downloads have been slow in being added so not all blu-ray CD's were available and as new technology published on new additions did not allow for the disk to be immediately available. Other than the noted drawbacks the unit does work however I find the PS3 to be a better option.
customer_reviews.author: fumblefingers

customer_reviews.title: Initial BD590 Impressions and Installation
customer_reviews.text: I received the product very fast from Amazon.com (they are always great with this). After looking at the instruction for this player and my Denon amplifier I was able to connect this with compoent video and optical audio and set up the player and wireless networking (secure connectioni) in about 15 minutes. Very simple to install, good instructions, and so far the on-screen set up of the player is great. Tested Youtube, played a BluRay and standard DVD, and all works very well. I will by trying Netflix I believe next. Overall great product, great value, like all the features (especially wireless and all the online services).
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Player
customer_reviews.text: WOW this is my first Blu Ray and I would definitely get another LG model. I works great with an old fashioned TV that is 9 years old and it had a great picture but was even better watching DVDs but when I hooked up my new LG LED TV 42" all I can say is WOW!!! WHY DID I WAIT SO LONG! I was a piece of cake to marry up my router (wireless)to the player and everything works virtually flawlessly. I do not regret it at all. The only thing I need to do is learn how to record to the hard drive. All the NETCAST products work just fine as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gunga32

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk that works for a while
customer_reviews.text: Until one day it doesn't. Stopped loading blu rays after 2 years of use. Not to mention, it's got an annoying, ugly UI and i never even bothered to set up the hard drive or used the streaming...all i wanted was to watch blu rays and regular DVDs. It would be amazing if just one company can make a player that just plays blu ray discs and does that well. but clearly, that's asking too much. mind blowing how this garbage makes it onto the market. stay away...
customer_reviews.author: Keith A. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Max volume too low
customer_reviews.text: At max vol some movies are OK.I'd give it 4 stars if audio output was not so low. My neighbor bought this exact unit, same problem. No audio output jacks so you can't easily add an amp.
customer_reviews.author: R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my husband. Connected to WIFI. We love it. BluRay quality is great! Instant downloads from NetFlix, but the selection is limited. (Great for kids movies, though.) View YouTube videos, download Pandora music, Napster. Only complaint is that the selection is limited through the player, as far as what services you can connect to thru the player. Can connect to home computer thru WIFI, but we have not set this up yet. No known glitches yet, but it has only been a little over a month since using.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have owned by BD590 for about 18 months. I use it mostly for netflix. I have played a very few DVD's on the unit. Went to play one the other day and all that appeared was a disk spinning in the upper left of the tv screen. I have reset the unit to factory settings, uploaded the lastest software. Used a MAXELL Blue Ray DVD cleaner. Tried other DVD's. Nothing works. I have owned Sony and Panasonic CD and DVD players and never had one fail. Certainly will not purchase another LG product.
customer_reviews.author: duane

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: The LG 590 is the best for me. It is easy to operate , easy to set up, and the remote works well. I love this machine. The picture quality is pristine. I have a LG flat screen. Both machines have the ability to talk to each other. I have just purchase another one for upstairs. Can't beat the price! The LG 690 has much more plastic and not as sturdy. LG products works for me. (electronics)
customer_reviews.author: geseg1

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: This blu-ray player is fast and has all sorts of network options. I love watching my favorite YouTube clips on my TV. I mainly bought this because I wanted to be able to stream NetFlix movies to my TV, and I was able to set that up quickly and easily. It plays my blu-rays perfectly. Great picture quality. I haven't had a single problem with the machine since I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Siege

customer_reviews.title: LG Bd590 is Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new DVD but after using my LG Blue Ray for a week i cannot live without it. It connected very easily to my home WI-FI and now streams Netflix, Pandora and all of my PC Music and Pics and Vids. A HDMI to my TV , 2 rca from TV to my 10 year old Pioneer VSX -D411 and this house is Rockin'..Unbelievably good Product, Congratulations LG!..and good price/service from Adorama Camera NY
customer_reviews.author: DavenRitaVille

customer_reviews.title: A blu-ray player that doesn't play blu-rays
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I have a faulty unit or what but this blu-ray player only plays regular dvds. Anytime a blu-ray dvd is inserted, I get a dvd/read error and the player spits it back out. I tried updating the firmware, changing the resolution, etc, to no avail. I chose this player because it had some of the best reviews of all the players on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: This was a great purchase, works great
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase, works great, I didn't have the problems some other people have had, it's nice to have the hard drive for family photos and videos. I had thought about putting music on the hard drive but kept it on the PC, I'm not sure why other manufacturers didn't add a hard drive to their units it is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: L. Garrick

customer_reviews.title: Nice blu-ray player
customer_reviews.text: Nice deal for the money. This is the second unit I have purchased because of the network connectivity. The picture quality is great and set up is easy. The only problem I had was that you can't see the MAC address until you hook it to your network and I use MAC Authentication on my wireless as a second line of defense. Other than that it is a nice machine.
customer_reviews.author: G. Robinette

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying an LG product, and I must say I'm impressed. When I first installed it I had a problem getting it to do what I wanted, but it turned out to be a problem with my universal remote, not the player. Picture quality is excellent, Internet access is perfect, and it looks great, too. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hambone

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I love this BD Blu Ray player, mostly for the accessibility to You Tube and Netflix. It was so easy to connect to my WIFI system and now I can watch my families posted Youtubes over my TV, watch any movies I wish off of NETFLIX, listen to Pandora and enjoy my music, I couldn't ask for a better system. I don't notice any delays watching DVD's or Blu-rays.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Nice but wireless does not work
customer_reviews.text: Although we have three other devices that connect without problems to our WiFi network from our TV room. The LG 590 will not even find the network 9 times out of 10. When it does connect the connection is not sustained for more than 20 minutes. Every time I try to reconnect I have to reenter the LAN ID and security code.
customer_reviews.author: CCP

customer_reviews.title: ive had this for 5 years works as good as the first day i got
customer_reviews.text: ive had this for 5 years works as good as the first day i got it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely equipped Blu Ray player
customer_reviews.text: Very quick to load especially BluRay titles--sometimes though a little noisy when loading. Otherwise very happy with this unit so far. Connecting to Netflix, Roxio etc all simple to set up and use...only problem I have with streaming movies is not with this unit but my sorry and slow internet provider (DSL with Bellsouth/ATT) and cannot upgrade in my current location. I really like the hard drive except for the occasional problem of when loading music cd's the Gracenote system has incorrectly named some of the songs and artists and I haven't yet figured out how to override their mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: LG 590
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid that (with all the warnings about wifi) the unit would have trouble downloading movies. Not at all! Was so easy to set up physically. Was super easy to get wifi movies. The highest resolution movies had to buffer a few seconds (twice in one movie), but it was during a busy time. I was sooooooooooo relieved that I had absolutely noooooooooooo problems.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ormsby

customer_reviews.title: LG BD590 Review
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived --3 Days "ahead" of scheduled Delivery Date.. Easy to Install--and Hook to My LCD TV... Initial Setup-- took a Little longer then I expected---- ((about a hr-1/2 ))..but once it was Configed... it was Nice.... ((Haven't tried the Hard Drive Yet.)) BLU_RAY--pictures are a Little disappointing---but I also-can say My TV--(( Full-1080P ))is 3 Yrs Old---so that may have something to do with that.. APPS-- connecting to the Internet --was a Snap.. and I really enjoy watching Netflix--Movies on demmand.. My Biggest dis-appointment was--- 5 Days---after I Purchased this Unit, it went on Sale for $40.00 Less---at a Local Store.. ((Same Unit---Same deal.. ))
customer_reviews.author: Bill R

customer_reviews.title: Great blu-ray player!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first blu-ray player. And I have to say, with all the reviews I went through, be it user or other, I definitely know I found the best. Even the streaming via wireless seems rather exceptional. I'd definitely recommend this to anyone who asks.++-
customer_reviews.author: Danbo

customer_reviews.title: LG BD 590 blu-ray player!
customer_reviews.text: This item is Amazing, perfect picture, fast loading time, literally plug and play (I did the installation in 1min). The connectivity with wireless network is piece of cake and the speed is amazing. It plays all possible formats, MKV, AVi's , Dvd rips and etc. Definitely the best option to buy is LG BD 590. The design is sleek and modern, the functions are easy and super efficient and the hard Drive is wow. Overall the product is a great success. I have tried it on both my TVs and it works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Burner 2004

customer_reviews.title: LG BD590 250 GB HD Network Blu-ray - Works great
customer_reviews.text: I've been really happy with this product over the past 4 years. Probably a little out of date these days, I actually use the pandora, netflix and youtube online streaming features way more than I use the DVD player. Other nice features are that it will connect to a home network and stream videos (so you can stream video's you've downloaded to your computer
customer_reviews.author: A. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: It works great at playing discs
customer_reviews.text: It works great at playing discs. It will no longer play youtube videos because the youtube software installed in this model is incombatible with the latest youtube advertisement formatting.
customer_reviews.author: D.Turner

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Over the last 6 months I have been watching this product. At the time there were only a few reviews. I was still apprehensive to buy the product because I so dislike wasting my time. Well, let me tell you...it is AWESOME!!!!! My husband said he has never set up a product so quickly. It is so ridiculously easy to use. My 4 and 5 year old can use it! We are watching so many movies and really enjoying it. If you are on the fence, I say go for it! Price is good, product is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Lots of features and options
customer_reviews.text: Lots of features, you will need a ripper to get your DVD's on the hard drive. A little mis-leading when it says store your movies on the HD, they are talking more about home movies. A network geeks dream.
customer_reviews.author: theclient

customer_reviews.title: Even a novice can set this up!
customer_reviews.text: As a novice, I wasn't sure we would be able to set this up easily (even with the help of a techie 13-year old to help). We didn't need to be concerned. The connections are easy to understand, and the packaging comes with a diagram that is simplicity itself. We wanted to be able to Stream Netflix, and with the right router we can do that wirelessly with outstanding quality. (Note: If you need a router, make sure you look for one with wireless streaming capability). We are very happy with LG.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good product, expected more functionality
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm pretty satisfied with the player. I expected to see more functions. It has excellent picture quality and the 250 GB hard drive is a plus compared with other products. Compared to other players, it should have Twitter, Facebook and other WebTv apps it lacks. No Hulu Plus, just Netflix and Vudu are available for video streaming.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Melnik

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Plays well and has lots of features. For some reason it doesn't always keep the password for the wireless network (no problems recently, though). My biggest complaint is that sometimes Netflix will start to play a show and the video will not come on. If you restart the show it is fine, but it is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: G. Dix

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased our Blu-ray for ourselves for Christmas. It has been the most used product in our home. We have been using it for streaming Netflix. It was super easy to hook up. The directions for use were clear and concise. I don't know how we've lived without it.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene L. Kutz

customer_reviews.title: LG  BLUE RAY
customer_reviews.text: The LG BD590 HD Blue Ray Works very well. Very nice picture and the internet connection to Netflix to play instant video's is a very good feature and is the reason i bought this model. I have been trying to set up the Hard drive so i could have video's of my grandchildren easily excessable but the instructions are not written very or its just difficult to navigate the system they designed. Why not just have a red button for record , it's worked well in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: LG Blu-Ray Streams Netflix With Ease!
customer_reviews.text: Like clock-work right our of the box! It found my 5 year old Linksys Router, one floor below, right away and we were off and running! Nice interface and lots of internet film and music sources!
customer_reviews.author: S. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: It works very well.
customer_reviews.text: It came on time. It is a very good quality product. It pays the Blue Ray disks, DVD disks and everything else. Also it has its own memory and allows the TV to be connected to the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Shifrin

customer_reviews.title: works fine, ugly user interface
customer_reviews.text: The device works fine for the most part it reads most of the video files, user interfaace is really ugly, pandora and netflix wont work outside of the u.s.a. (or at least not in latin América) but what dissapoints me the most is the user interface and the remote control, they won't make your tv too smart. I would have rather pay a Little more for another brand
customer_reviews.author: DeProfundis

customer_reviews.title: HD Network Blu-ray Player
customer_reviews.text: Item was easy to set up, a breeze to put on home network, and works seemlessly as a DVR, great with Netflix and Pandora, and you do not need to be a computer geek to get it going. It does a really nice job of working with both blu-ray and DVD. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: fredricd

customer_reviews.title: Great Blue-ray
customer_reviews.text: This player performed flawlessly right from the box. I was able to connect it to my wireless Netgear N router on the first try. We stream Netflix movies and the picture quality is quite good but not excellent on my 60" Mitsubishi DLP, connected with a HDMI. Regular DVD playback is very good also. I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Blumenfeld

customer_reviews.title: great blue player
customer_reviews.text: bought this product about 4 years ago when 1 redid my stereo system- still works just fine- would buy another if I needed one
customer_reviews.author: dg

customer_reviews.title: Play This...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy controls. Slim design. Almost intuitive remote. It's difficult to differentiate between a $1400.00 DVD player and this one. They both show movies. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: airhound

customer_reviews.title: LOVE DOING BUSINESS WITH WOODCRAFT PATTERNS
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as advertized and customer service was fantastic. I love WOODCRAFT PATTERNS.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good product, tolerable problems.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a good product for the money. There are some problems of the unit freezing up. Usually, we just reboot and its fine. Doesn't happen all the time just once in a great while. Very easy to set up, connectivity is great. Programs are easy to access. Don't like the remote much because the keys are too flat. Can't tell if you hit the right option. Remote should light up in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: pmelendez

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift. Works as described. This product has no Recording function for the signal cable feed, which would make this product perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: LG Blu-Ray Wireless DVD Player is high quality item
customer_reviews.text: A great way to stream the internet services. Wonderful Amazon purchase, priced right. Easy setup, with your good broadband service and wi-fi in home, this wireless B-R DVD player provides exceptional quality for movies and more off the I-net.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Fudala

customer_reviews.title: LG Blu-ray Disc Player fits the bill as gift and for good functionality
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We love the options for Netflix, Pandora, You Tube. Recommend buying this item as a gift for husband, the man with everything.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a decent Blu-Ray Player
customer_reviews.text: We tried a couple of Blu-Ray players from Wal-Mart including the piece of junk Black Friday Magnavox player. We finally researched online to find the best player for a reasonable price and we found exactly that with this LG player. We absolutely love this player and would buy it again in a heartbeat.

What I like best about this product is its ease of use especially when it comes to web based services like you tube etc. What I would like to see in this product (and for that matter in all network blu ray players) is for the ability to have a browser embedded in the firmware so that you can watch web content and videos directly through the blu ray device.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Blu-ray is great, picture is outstanding, wireless is easy to connect. Only issue I had was getting the correct information from my cable provider Time Warner to input into the Blu-ray. Once I got the correct information the setup was very easy.

For example, it can't connect to Amazon streaming video and evidently there are no plans to do so. You are locked into the prepackaged connections eg Netflix, Pandora etc. Also, couldn't link to my PC and their help desk was no help.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm

customer_reviews.title: Nice player with lots of features

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Blu-ray player

My tv is 120 so not really compatiable together. Both are LG'S so that is not the problem. It was a good price on it if only it had 120 hz on the player.

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Roku and a Blu-Ray instead
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the Roku and my previous Blu-Ray in the media room (was going to move Roku to bedroom), but it is not nearly a Roku. No Amazon videos on this and no option to add Amazon, which has almost replaced Netflix (which we recently swore by) in our house. On the LG, there is no Netflix SEARCH capability so you have to go to a computer to search and add Netflix videos to the LG's "instant view", then you may select. With the Roku, we could search on the television without a computer. I've only had this for three weeks, but I am very disappointed that it does not have obvious and expected capabilities.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bluray player!

product_meta.title: LG BD590 250 GB HD Network Blu-ray Disc Player
product_meta.description:
Move beyond even the amazing capabilities of Blu-ray and instant streaming entertainment with the BD590 Blu-ray Disc player from LG. You're not just getting the best way to enjoy Full HD 1080p with Blu-ray or the unparalleled entertainment options of being hooked up to Net Cast Entertainment Access. This is fully loaded with a 250GB Media Library that lets you store your music, photos and HD movies you purchase from Vudu. This is something better than Blu-ray.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 Introducing the first Blu-Ray Disc™ Player that can store and stream! The BD590 gives you the best of the Internet with wireless access to NetCast, but that’s not all. With a 250GB hard drive, all your favorite entertainment can live in one place, letting you instantly enjoy music, photos, home videos and HD VOD from Vudu™. When one device can deliver this many home entertainment options, you really have to ask—is it a Blu-Ray Disc™ Player, or something better? 



INNOVATIVE FEATURES
Store it. Stream it. Keep it.
Your media can finally live in one place. An integrated 250GB hard drive lets you store videos, movies, music and HD VOD content from Vudu™ on your Network Blu-Ray Disc™ Player, for instant access anytime you want.

Less Clutter. More Possibilities.
Cut loose from messy wires. Integrated WiFi Connecticity allows you to take advantage of NetCast™ Entertainment Access from any available Wi-FI connection, anywhere in its range.

Entertainment On Tap
The end of "there’s nothing on." NetCast™ Entertainment Access lets you stream instant, and virtually endless, entertainment from Netflix®, Vudu™, CinemaNow™, Pandora®, YouTube™, Picasa™ and AccuWeather® direct to your TV from the Internet- no computer required.

The Feature Is Yours
Access videos, photos and music from your home network through this DLNA certified media player. This feature brings digital entertainment libraries within easy reach to the big screen.

Enjoy It at It's Best
Make the most of your HDTV. Blu-Ray Disc™ playback delivers exceptional Full 1080p video performance.

Making Old Just Like New
No need to go out and replace your old DVD collection. Even they look better on Blu-Ray. Standard DVD Up-Scaling delivers exceptional image quality from standard DVDs with 1080p Up-Scaling via HDMI™ output.

Don’t just hear it. Feel it.
Great picture needs great sound. Get Superior Audio Performance that supports surround sound up to 7.1 channels with Dolby® Digital Plus, Dolby® TrueHD and dts-HD Advanced Digital Out technologies.

Don’t Wait To Watch
A quick-opening tray- ready to play before you hit the couch.

Memories on the big screen
Want to view a highlight reel of the family vacation in the comfort of your living room? USB Media Host lets you view family photos, and listen to music from USB storage devices.

All In One
Are your remote controls taking over your living room? Now with SimpLink™ you can easily set up and control all of your HDMI™ connected LG devices with just one remote.

Export Full Digital Sound 
Deliver full digital sound quality from your Blu-Ray Disc™ player to your television with optical and coaxial audio output connectivity.

Multi-compatible 
Don’t you hate it when newer devices aren’t compatible with older components? A discrete 7.1 channel means the BD590 can still operate with older audio-video receivers.




LEARN MORE
Media Library
The Media Library integrated hard drive allows for easy storage and instant playback of music, photos, personal videos and VOD content available through the Vudu™ movie service. The 250GB internal hard drive stores up to 70 HD movies.




NetCast™ Entertainment Access
Now buying a Blu-Ray Disc™ player from LG can also mean getting access to virtually endless entertainment and services from the Internet. Want to watch your favorite action film? If you have an LG Network Blu-Ray Disc™ Player with NetCast™ Entertainment Access and an Internet connection, select an onscreen service and you’ll be enjoying it in moments. Tapping into virtually endless entertainment from the Internet no longer requires a computer or messy wires. This is the future of entertainment, and it’s available now with LG.

Roxio CinemaNow™
Now Hollywood’s latest hits can be viewed any time you want. With CinemaNow™, LG consumers can get instant access to pay-per-view movies from major studios directly to any LG Network Blu-Ray Disc™ Player. Find major release titles, along with broadcast and cable television programs. The entire premium content catalog can be browsed directly and selections can be watched instantly. CinemaNow™ and LG have redefined what can be expected of digitally available entertainment.

Netflix®
Make the most of the extensive offerings on Netflix®. Users with a subscription can sit back and enjoy unlimited instant access to over 12,000 Netflix® movies and TV episodes* streamed directly to their TV set. Most movies and TV episodes appear in standard definition and many selections are not new releases.

Netflix® subscription required and sold separately.

YouTube™
Now you can watch everything on YouTube™ right in your living room. Blu-ray players with NetCast™ give you unlimited, direct access to the millions of Web videos available through YouTube™, whenever you want them. All you need is an active Internet connection. Watch that one fellow making a fool of himself over and over again.

Vudu™
If you want major studio releases in Full HD 1080p and Dolby® Digital Plus sound, Vudu™ is the only place you’ll find it. With 20,000 HD titles available, and 2,000 in Blu-ray-quality HDX format, there’s no better source for streaming HD movies on NetCast™.

Pandora®
Listen to a radio station made just for you. By entering artist or song information, Pandora® will generate a playlist of similar recommendations. Your new favorite song is waiting.

Picasa™
Edit digital photos so they look their best when shared on your television screen, and create galleries and slideshows for easy organization any time you want to enjoy them.

Accuweather®
Get up to the minute weather updates, plus forecast information to help plan ahead.




Standard DVD Up-Scaling
It’s not just Blu-Ray Discs that look great on a Blu-Ray Disc™ Player. Standard DVD Up-Scaling delivers exceptional image quality from standard DVDs to near full HD picture quality. That means even your older movies and shows look better on an LG Network Blu-Ray Disc™ Player.




Superior Audio Performance
Blu-ray lets you enjoy the best sound available from your movies and shows. Supports surround sound up to 7.1 channels with Dolby® Digital Plus, Dolby® TrueHD and dts-HD Advanced Digital Out technologies.




USB 2.0 Media Host
Bring your digital library to life on your television with USB 2.0 Media Host. View family photos, watch videos and listen to music from USB storage devices.




SimpLink™
Are your remote controls taking over the living room? Now with SimpLink™, you can easily set up and control all of your HDMI™ connected LG devices with just one remote.
